thread.title: BRIEF-LPKF says defends LDS patent in German patent court
thread.title_full: BRIEF-LPKF says defends LDS patent in German patent court | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-LPKF says defends LDS patent in German patent court
text:
Aug 4 LPKF
* LPKF defends LDS patent in federal patent court
* Won another key victory in legal dispute with Motorola concerning infringement of patent for laser direct structuring (LDS) developed by LPKF
* Will take action to ensure that patent infringement proceedings now proceed as quickly as possible Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
